mapper.insert: insert into FLOOR_MANFLOORMAN( ID, BUILD_NO, FLOOR, FLOOR_MASTER_NAME, MASTER_TEL, CREATE_TIME, FLOORMAN_ID ) values ( #{ID}, #{BUILD_NO}, #{FLOOR}, #{FLOOR_MASTER_NAME}, #{MASTER_TEL}, #{CREATE_TIME}, #{FLOORMAN_ID} )
mapper.update: update FLOOR_MANFLOORMAN set ID = #{ID}, BUILD_NO = #{BUILD_NO}, FLOOR = #{FLOOR}, FLOOR_MASTER_NAME = #{FLOOR_MASTER_NAME}, MASTER_TEL = #{MASTER_TEL}, CREATE_TIME = #{CREATE_TIME}, FLOORMAN_ID = FLOORMAN_ID where FLOORMAN_ID = #{FLOORMAN_ID}
mapper.select: select ID, BUILD_NO, FLOOR, FLOOR_MASTER_NAME, MASTER_TEL, CREATE_TIME, FLOORMAN_ID from FLOOR_MANFLOORMAN where FLOORMAN_ID = #{FLOORMAN_ID}
select a.ID, a.BUILD_NO, a.FLOOR, a.FLOOR_MASTER_NAME, a.MASTER_TEL, a.CREATE_TIME, a.FLOORMAN_ID from FLOOR_MANFLOORMAN a
select a.ID, a.BUILD_NO, a.FLOOR, a.FLOOR_MASTER_NAME, a.MASTER_TEL, a.CREATE_TIME, a.FLOORMAN_ID from FLOOR_MANFLOORMAN a
mapper.delete:
delete from FLOOR_MANFLOORMAN where FLOORMAN_ID in
